mods.name: Advance
mods.description: Increases Basic Attack Damage by %s1%

mods.name: Tactics
mods.description: Increases Skill Effect by %s1%

mods.name: Armor Breaker
mods.description:
When weapon skills deal direct Physical Damage, has a %s1% chance to modify the target's Armor by %s2% for 6s. 
Trigger Interval: 30s

mods.name: Fortify
mods.description:
When Basic Attacks deal direct damage, has a (melee weapons %s1% / ranged weapons %s2%) chance to gain  [Target-based Max HP %s3%] Shield for 4s.
Trigger Interval: 30s.

mods.name: Dominate
mods.description:
When weapon skills or Basic Attacks deal DirectDamage to enemies under Hard Control effects(Stun, Fear, Freeze, Knockup, Petrify), there is a%s1% chance to reduce their Damage Resistance by%s2% for 4s.
Cooldown: 30s.

mods.name: Upperhand
mods.description:
When dealing direct damage with Basic Attacks,has a %s1% chance to increase Basic AttackDamage by %s2% for 4s.
Trigger Interval: 30s.

mods.name: Pursuit
mods.description:
When dealing direct damage with Basic Attacks,has a (melee weapons %s1% / ranged weapons %s2%)chance to modify the target's Movement Speed by%s3% for 4s.
Trigger Interval: 10s

mods.name: Ravage
mods.description:
When scoring a Critical Hit, has a %s1% chance tomodify the target's Damage Resistance by %s2% for4s.
Trigger Interval: 30s.

mods.name: Magic Break
mods.description:
When weapon skills deal direct Magic Damage, hasa %s1% chance to modify the target's MagicResistance by %s2% for 6s.
Trigger Interval: 30s

mods.name: Charge
mods.description:
When weapon skills deal direct damage, has a %s1%chance to restore %s2% MP.
Trigger Interval: 8s.

mods.name: Haste
mods.description:
When casting weapon skills, has a %s1% chance toincrease Cooldown Speed by %s2% for 4s.
Trigger Interval: 30s.

mods.name: Nimbleness
mods.description:
When landing a Basic Attack crit, %s1% chance toincrease Dodge by %s2% for 4s
Cooldown: s30.

mods.name: Piercing Chill
mods.description:
When inflicting Hard Control effects (Stun,Fear, Freeze, Knockup, Petrify, Sleep) with aWeapon Skill, %s1% chance to lower the enemy'sHealing Received by %s2% for 4s
Cooldown: 30s.

mods.name: Drain
mods.description:
When inflicting a DOT with a Weapon Basicttack or Skill, %s1% chance to recover %s2% HP
Cooldown: 20s.

mods.name: Valor
mods.description:
Only triggers with GreatswordsWhen weapon skills or Basic Attacks deal directdamage, has a %s1% chance to gain 1 stacks ofSword Momentum and increase DamageResistance by %s2% for 4s.
Trigger Interval: 15s.Sword Momentum: Damage Boost: +3% (3% perstack, can stack)Damage Resistance: +4% (4% per stack, can stack)Attack Speed: +4% (4% per stack, can stack)

mods.name: Disrupt
mods.description:
Only triggers with MacesWhen weapon skills or Basic Attacks deal DirectDamage, has a 35% chance to create a disruptionfield around the caster. Enemies within take %s1%reduced Damage and have their Attack Speedreduced by %s2% for 4s.
Cooldown: 20.

mods.name: Seize Chance
mods.description:
Only triggers with AxesWhen gaining the [Bloodthirst] buff, has a %s3%chance to increase Attack Speed by %s2% andDamage by %s1% for 6s.
Trigger Interval: 20s.

mods.name: Detonate
mods.description:
Only triggers with BowsWhen arrows deal direct damage, has a %s1%chance of creating an explosion at the targetlocation dealing [Damage Rate: %s2%] Physical Damage and applying[Target Mark]. Also stun for 1.5 seconds.
Trigger Interval: 20s.

mods.name: Synergy
mods.description:
Only triggers with SpearsWhen scoring a Critical Hit, has a %s1% chance toincrease Attack Speed by %s2% for 6s.
Cooldown: 20s

mods.name: Annihilate
mods.description:
Only triggers with DaggersAgainst targets below 40%, Basic Attacks have a%s1% chance to deal additional [Damage Rate: %s2%]Physical Damageand apply 2 stacks of [Bleed].
Trigger Interval: 15s.[Bleed]: Deals [Damage Rate: 30%] PhysicalDamage every second for 8s, stacking up to 6times. At max stacks, causes Hemorrhage,removing all stacks and instantly dealing  [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage.

mods.name: Wild Growth
mods.description:
Only triggers with Bloom StavesWhen weapon skills or Basic Attacks directly healan ally with Recovery, has a %s1% * Recovery stackschance to grant  [Target-based Max HP %s2%] Shieldfor 4s.
Trigger Interval: 15s.Recovery: Restores [Healing Rate: 12%] HP everysecond for 12s, stacking up to 3 times.
Trigger Interval: 20s.

mods.name: Ice Blast
mods.description:
Only triggers with Ice FociWhen weapon skills or Basic Attacks deal directdamage, has a %s1% chance to trigger a frostexplosion at the target location that deals [Damage Rate: %s2%] Magic Damage to all enemies within 4m and inflicts Frost.
Trigger Interval: 20s.Frost: Movement Speed is reduced by -40% for 4s,Slow gradually diminishes over time

mods.name: Flame Blast
mods.description:
Only triggers with CannonadesWhen weapon skills or Basic Attacks deal directdamage, has a %s1% chance to trigger a flameexplosion at the target location that deals [Damage Rate: %s2%] Magic Damage to all enemies within 4m and inflicts 2stacks of Burn.
Trigger Interval: 15s.Burn: Deals [Damage Rate: 25%] Magic Damageevery second for 8s, stacking up to 6 times. At 6stacks, removes the effect and deals  [Damage Rate: 80%] Magic Damage to enemy targets within4m of the carrier.

mods.name: Blessing
mods.description:
Only triggers with Radiant FluxesWhen weapon skills or Basic Attacks apply directhealing to allies, has a %s1% chance to increasetarget's Damage Resistance by %s2% for 5s.
Trigger Interval: 15s.

mods.name: Curse
mods.description:
Only triggers with VoidcallersWhen weapon skills or Basic Attacks inflict DoTeffects on enemies, has a %s1% chance to inflict 2stacks of Plague.
Trigger Interval: %s2%s.Plague: Deals [Damage Rate: 20%] Magic Damageevery 3s for 13s. Stacks up to 10 times.

mods.name: Retrofit
mods.description:
When Weapon Skills or Basic Attacks deal direct damage, has a %s1% chance to restore 2 bullet and  boosts Basic Attack Damage by %s2% for 6s.
Trigger Interval: 15s.

mods.name: EarthQuake
mods.description:
When a weapon skill inflicts Hard Control effects(Stun, Fear, Frozen, Knockup, Petrify) or Pulleffects, it has a %s1% chance to create anearthquake at the target's location. After a1.5-second delay, it deals[Damage Rate: %s2%] Physical Damage andapplies Stun for %s3% seconds.
Cooldown: 30s.

mods.name: Rend
mods.description:
When dealing direct damage with Basic Attacks,has a %s1% chance to deal additional[Damage Rate: %s2%] Physical Damage to the current target and reduceMovement Speed by %s3% for 2s.
Trigger Interval: 20s

mods.name: Retribution
mods.description:
When weapon skills deal direct damage, there is a%s1% chance to trigger an explosion at the targetlocation, dealing [Damage Rate: %s2%]Magic Damage  and increasingDamage Resistance by %s3% for 6s.
Trigger Interval: 30s.

mods.name: Bloodgrudge
mods.description:
When dealing Direct Damage with a WeaponBasic Attack or Skill, %s1% chance to gain 1 stackof a %s2% damage boost buff for every 10% ofmissing HP. The buff lasts 4s and stacks up to5 times
Cooldown: 30s.

mods.name: Shadowstep
mods.description:
When using a Weapon Skill, %s1% chance toreduce the CD of weapon-exclusive skills by %s2% s
Cooldown: 30s.
